description: Detects MMC20.Application Lateral Movement; specifically looks for the spawning of the parent MMC.exe with a command line of "-Embedding" as a child of svchost.exe Author: @2xxeformyshirt (Security Risk Advisors) - rule; Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: MMC20 Lateral Movement
